Name: <:kbplogo:1092403749059829853> Kozma's Backpack
Description: The go-to place for all your merchanting deeds, price history, price checking and sale logs for many items in the game.

Name: <:haven:1059542508209701005> Haven
Description: Haven is the ever-growing unofficial space for Spiral Knights made by and for the community. Where you can be part of the latest discussions, browse hundreds of game mods, and much more.

Name: :video_game: The Arcade
Description: The Arcade is the oldest and largest running unofficial community server for the game.

Name: :farmer: The Furnace
Description: Do you like grinding FSC but don't have enough friends to run with? Then The Furnace is the place to be for you!

Name: :art: The Snipe Garden
Description: The Snipe Garden is the unofficial art hub of community artists where you can share related content and get to know other artists in the community!

Name: :crossed_swords: Fortune Knights RP
Description: Jump in, build your own character and story, and interact with others in the community's go-to place for Roleplay.

Name: :goggles: VRChat Haven
Description: Want to enjoy even more Spiral Knights outside of the game? Head over to VRChat Haven!
